name: Under The Sky
description:
"Under the sky, above the ocean, on a stone I built my home..."

A game about creativity,  disconnection, and loneliness. This is my first Bitsy project, I can't HIGHLY recommend enough you listen to 'Arlen - Take Me Far Away' on your play-through.

Follow me on twitter @tonynowak44

 Or check out my creator page here on itch!
